page.title: 03A Day in my Life(1) - Darwen
page.content: On Wednesday I got up at 7.0am. I washed my face then I came downstairs. I ate my breakfast then I read my {Koran.}I put my uniform on and walked to school at 8.30am.After registration my first lesson was{Mathematics.}At break I went outside and played football. Second lesson,{Humanities;} third,{Science. I walked home for dinner which my mother had ready.I came back to school for registration at 1.10pm. The next lesson was{Classics}followed by {English.}When the bell rang I walked home. I changed my clothes and went to the{mosque.}When I came home I played cricket with my friends. I came in at 9 o-clock.I ate my supper and did my homework and watched T.V. I went to bed at 10.00pm. by{Mehdi Aftab}aged 13.
